articles.author: MOGOMOTSI MAGOME Associated Press
articles.title: South Africa's government won't help the illegal miners inside a closed mine - ABC News
articles.description: South Africa’s government will not help the illegal miners inside a closed mine as part of an official policy against illegal mining
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG -- South Africa's government says it won't help a group of illegal miners inside a closed mine in the country's North West province who have been denied access to basic supplies as part … [+3354 chars]
